website_summaries.verdict: Compact HiFi Bluetooth-integrated speaker that is durable and long-playing with 10 hours of battery life.
pros: Superior sound provided by speaker's HiFi neodymium driver and powerful subwoofer
Metal construction, IP45-rated for durability and water resistance (not waterproof)
Able to stream music from up to 30 feet away
cons: Speakers did not provide enough sound volume or stability for some purchasers

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to allow me to hear my audiobooks while commuting. My 2009 Mini does not have smart phone connection so I needed something to amplify the audio from the phone when traveling at 70+ mph. Did not realize that the wireless connection cuts out whenever there is a brief pause in the audio and then cuts back in when the narrator speaks. This makes the audiobook very choppy, missing the first part of many sentences, just enough to be noticeable. Sound quality is much better than the phone Just a technical issue with how these speakers work I guess. People should be aware if this is what you are buying them for.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B Arnold

customer_reviews.title: It has amazing volume for such a small form factor
customer_reviews.text: I give presentations in front of groups of all sizes. Many times, venues are not equipped with proper audio. This little guy has saved me several times. It has amazing volume for such a small form factor.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: great sound and feel, low bluetooth range
customer_reviews.text: sounded better than i expected, no issues connecting, feels like good quality and the back (bottom depending on how you look at it, the pictures are deceptive, its meant to sit with the speaker facing up) is rubberized so it doesnt move around. helpful skip and volume controls on the device which is rare on BT speakers for some reason. only downfall is the range is HORRIBLE. i have JLAB headsets with amazing range but this speaker will hiccup if my phone is in my pocket 5 feet away on the other side of the car (usually use it while turning wrenches). otherwise it's works and sounds great, just wish they would fix the range.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is pretty awesome it's small and has a great battery life. I'll take it golfing then come home and go work out with it then bring it to work and use it. It says it has a 10 hour battery life but I use this thing all the time and rarely charge it and it has never died on me, I'd honestly say the battery is closer to about 15 hours or more of life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong prescence
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker after my roommate picked up the same one and he uses it as his primary speaker for his projector when we watch movies and every time he uses it I'm astounded at the sound sound quality and volume. I bought my own to use with a projector myself and to connect both speakers at once for full coverage where we watch movies and I love how clear it comes through. Note: we use an aux cable for the projector setup, solid for gaming too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Clark

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker has great sound quality and battery life. HOWEVER, if anything remotely blocks the direct line of sight between my phone and the speaker, the Bluetooth cuts out. For example, the speaker could be on my child's bed and the phone could be on her dresser, 3 feet away, but if I walk in between, it blips out. Gave it to my husband to play music in the bathroom and I'll have to get another speaker for the kiddo for night time stories.
customer_reviews.author: itsallgreek2me

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for such a small thing!
customer_reviews.text: Super incredible sound for the price and the size! I hooked this up to my mini-PC for my son to play video games and listen to music. I am very happy at the sound quality, it has good bass and the volume is loud! We have not tried it the water resistant part but the distance is about 30 feet between 3 rooms in our apartment. Excellent speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Kahlos Mahn

customer_reviews.title: expectations
customer_reviews.text: This company has a great reputation. I was hoping my upgraded speaker would be a marked improvement over the previous one. Only mildly so. While my 1st speaker was missing a lot if the low end, the sound was clean. This has very good bass but is missing a lot if the high end, and sounds a little muddled. It has the perception that it is sturdy which it would have to be by the claim that it is super portable. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: ssri

customer_reviews.title: Good value, great for travel
customer_reviews.text: likes: small size, perfect for travel; sound quality is acceptable - you get what you pay for. Does not compare to my Bose mini, but is much lighter weight, and charges via short USB cord, so is easy to throw in a carry-on bag without taking up valuable space.
customer_reviews.author: busyreader

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok and the size is handy. You can’t move the speaker around and you can’t move your device much, either, without losing the connection. It’s fine as long as you’re sitting still. I have the mini crasher also, and the same issue applies.
customer_reviews.author: Aquino

customer_reviews.title: perfect little device
customer_reviews.text: i) perfect size, ii) very good sound quality, iii) very fast and easy bluetooth connection, iv) good but not great battery life, therefore, a perfect little help to get better sound from your smartphone for music, podcasts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Jorge Prass

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound. Stylish looking. I got pink. Long battery life. One drawback JBL does not include instructions. Well, full instructions. Just fast start, simple guide. I had questions i had to spend too much time researching. For what i use this for its perfect... Which is to hear audio books mostly. Kindle crappy speakers are an embarrassment. If you want to play music.... party ...loudly... This may not be the thing...
customer_reviews.author: WynnCreek5

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all of about 2 weeks before one of the speakers blew out. Have had the jlab bouncer about four years now and figured this one would be just as reliable but that was not the case. Got it on sale for 25$ but not worth even that. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Chavez

customer_reviews.title: if there's too much silence, it yells GOOD BYE
customer_reviews.text: you turn it on, it tells you how the battery is doing. ok. you use it for a while then pause the video so you can read an email. you need to answer the email. several minutes have passed since you paused the video and you are in a groove not thinking about your petulant needy obnoxious speaker. it could just turn itself off, but no. first it has to yell GOOD BYE so that you will have a stroke.
customer_reviews.author: smithersz

customer_reviews.title: but the quality has tailed off and the sound and volume aren't as good as the originals
customer_reviews.text: When these first came out they were fabulous, but the quality has tailed off and the sound and volume aren't as good as the originals. I think there are better versions out there now. Having said that I've bought four of them!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Beveridge

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy, poor sound!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a lot of portable speakers, trying to find one that has a good battery life, good connectivity and good sound. This has the worst sound that I’ve come across so far!
customer_reviews.author: prattcarioca

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: The product synched up via Bluetooth easily and performed as expected and perhaps even beyond expectation. The battery life is exceptional. Played for hours without a recharge. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker with long battery life
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great! Sound quality is good, volume is good, battery life is pretty long. I use it in my car as a temporary fix until I put a new radio in. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: jhz7224

customer_reviews.title: Good audio quality, room filling sound.
customer_reviews.text: I've preferred the jlab earbuds for years, and the Bouncer blutooth speakers are great. Overall, though, the Crasher XL has better battery life, very good sound quality, and is outdoor suitable with great water/splash resistance.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, limited Bluetooth range
customer_reviews.text: My phone can only be a few feet away from the speaker or it starts to lose Bluetooth connection. It works great for my purposes, I can have my phone close enough, but keep that in mind. The sound is great and the battery lasts at least 6 hours. (Haven’t tested it longer)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My son has one & loves it in the garage. His wife keeps getting it & using it in the house. So I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter-in-law so he can keep his in the garage. They both love it & has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrie Olson

customer_reviews.title: Love this compact speaker - just took it to the beach!
customer_reviews.text: I might have given this product five stars, but the only negative I can find is the Bluetooth distance limitation. It connects right away, but if you move your phone or tablet more than say, 8 to 10 feet away, it starts to cut out. This is fine at the beach or on a picnic, because you can put your phone near it and you're on your way. I also don't believe it will charge your phone via the USB port unless the speaker is actually plugged in ... but I'm not 100% sure on that. Great product, easy to carry because it's small, but great sound for a compact speaker. BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Horror

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker! Good quality and small enough you can keep it with you .., Only negative is the speaker is a little heavy but highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker at my salon loft and it’s perfect. The quality is so good that my clients typically believe the music is coming from an overhead speaker in my salon. The batter life is also excellent!
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I really surprise with the sound quality, its really warm... this is so tiny, when you open the box, you will never imagine how its sound, until you turn on your music, its great. but, the bluetooth connection its not good. i cover the top of my phone with my hand, and suddenly the connection is off. i dont know why, almost all JLAB product with bluetooth connection, do the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you really want the product are returns is at your cost.
customer_reviews.text: Brought this because I like Jlab I have wireless headphones and speakers! the speaker didn’t work for the moment I try to connect it but now they want me to pay for shipping that cost more than this crap of a product BE AWARE this is my first bad experience on Amazon since I’ve been with them.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a volume button. Also, the sound quality is not that good. My phone has better quality!
customer_reviews.author: candice burnett

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Small and portable and works with Bluetooth. It also has a cord in case you want to use it that way. Decent speakers considering how small they are and for the price. It has a light when you are charging it, but there is no way to tell if it is finished charging or at what stage the charging is. Or you can't tell if it is almost out of juice. So I just keep it charged regularly. I love the purple and green colors.
customer_reviews.author: JANET K.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: It sounds great for a small speaker but the Bluetooth is not the best sometimes it works great and sometimes it doesn’t
customer_reviews.author: pens66

customer_reviews.title: good product just not as prescribed
customer_reviews.text: the bluetooth work great. the speaker has good sound. it is just not as loud as described. iwas under the impression that i was purchasing a high quality speaker. the speaker is decent but the volume is no where near what i though it would be according to the description. it does double as a backup battery and last for the period as described give or take a few hours. the highs are decent and even at max capacity it does not distort. bass is not that great but for the price you can not beat it.
customer_reviews.author: peeler

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I've using it for the last week and so far so good, no complaints at all. Love the compact design.
customer_reviews.author: Mónica0711

customer_reviews.title: Little box with BIG BEATS.
customer_reviews.text: I am a DJ and sound enthusiast. I needed something to replace my clumsy wired portable speakers. I was leaning towards a Jambox untill I saw the extra features this provides for half the price. This did the trick easily. I charged it once I got it. Paired easily and upon the first try. Even took it outside in the open patio and it was easily heard over the regular outside noise. If your looking for a quality portable speaker with Great quality sound, yes the bass was sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Gravy Playa

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit that has solid sound and looks really ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit that has solid sound and looks really cool. Easy to pair with my mini tablet and the battery life easily lasted for an entire golf round.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little speaker. The only downside is the sometimes it looses the connection, requiring a little adjustment to the placement. Good clarity for such a small unit.
customer_reviews.author: JLR

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: For a little speaker this is great. Perfect for the beach, camping or bedroom. They were great stocking stuffers and kids love them. Great battery life.
customer_reviews.author: cathy fink

customer_reviews.title: No volume control
customer_reviews.text: No volume control. Very low volume. I cannot hear it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective...out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The sound is satisfying,but connection drops when the speaker is moved more than about 5 feet from the phone. It is defective, out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Pyrtle, III

customer_reviews.title: Good little BT Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Came across The Crasher while researching potentially more expensive choices over the holidays. As others have observed, it lacks in the bass area, but otherwise it's a well-constructed speaker with excellent battery life, packaged superbly with audio cord, USB, and plug-in cube, and comes with a little sheet noting the serial number of each speaker. The size also makes it perfect for placement in my non-BT car.
customer_reviews.author: dxace1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to connect and louder than expected perfect for camping
customer_reviews.text: A lot of sound out of a little speaker. Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to connect and louder than expected perfect for camping!
customer_reviews.author: Annette B.

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is a good buy. The battery life is as described which ...
customer_reviews.text: Speaker is a good buy. The battery life is as described which is a plus. I drive for a parcel company so it lasts all day. My only complaint is that I wish it were louder only because diesel trucks are loud anyway and they tend to drown out the sound when both doors are open on my truck. For the price, it's a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your Buck in portable speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Girlfriend and she enjoys it! JLAB always has something good on the market. I own the headphones and the sound quality is amazing. The crasher has a sub in the back that handles the low frequency's really well. in a room you can hear it really well but outside on a beach its best to have it in front of a wall or a wood plank so the lows can resonate off it. The design is solid, my friend has drop his many times and all that is left is small dings. The battery life is Great!!
customer_reviews.author: George Tarasenko

customer_reviews.title: alot is sound in a little box
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit I was really surprised to get the sound that came out of this little box setting of the Bluetooth is super easy it doesn't have a problem with connecting and disconnecting the battery seemed to last for ever to be honest with you the construction of the product is really sturdy investable it seems like my family loves this thing I'm going to be mostly buying another one it was definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Evolution

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get very loud
customer_reviews.text: I'd advise buying something louder, even for a golf course it's not very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great music box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little music box a while ago and it still works great. Its portable, durable and the battery lasts for a ridiculous amount of time. You link it to your phone, play music, even charge your phone off its battery although that'll kill its battery very quick. I've even bought this box for friends birthdays because I like it so much.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and I personally think it's attractive
customer_reviews.text: Small but mighty. Great sound and I personally think it's attractive. The Crasher Slim. Love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Toni M. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: JLAB Crusher Good all around!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good speaker sounds great and gets loud enough. Will charge my phone good in an emergency. I wish the range of the blue tooth was better but I can live with it. Really like the fact I can plug another speaker into it chaining together speakers makes it easy to get more volume and sound! Seller sent it to me very fast and was very pleased with its arrival new and nice!
customer_reviews.author: Shoei117

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker (charging cord, not so much)
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner and product was well packaged and as advertised. The charger cord however has a short or is somehow defective as its hit or miss if it will charge. (Not the plug. And we've plugged in other cords to the plug and they all work). So a little disappointing. Came with a carrying bag and the sound quality is great. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality of sound for the size and price. Bluetooth connectivity was great as long as the connection remains unblocked (by literally any object such as a dresser, a body, door, a hand, etc within the 30ft advertised distance capability.)
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON DUCKWORTH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: This little thing does exactly what I wanted at a great price. In a house full of people sometimes you just need your own music session without disturbing anyone else. This gives you just that. Very happy I looked so long to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lambright

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied; it exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: It obviously doesn't BLAST music, but none of these speakers do - at least for this price. It is very loud compared to what I had expected. I was very pleasantly surprised. I am very satisfied; it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DMS007

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a christmas gift for someone I live with so I've had the pleasure of experiencing this speaker for about a week or 2 now. I think the price is just right as it has some pretty cool features and sound quality. The battery lasts super long, was of course easy to pair with a smartphone, and really haven't had any complaints or issues with it so far. The sound is quite thick and full, no distortions anything unpleasing to the ear that I can hear. Made with a very tough rugged metal casing, really good product that also came very quickly with basic shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Doviak

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Great Sound Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I have heard other wireless bluetooth speakers and these can hold their own. A snap to set up and play and it will charge your phone too. Now it's no Bose but it doesn't have the huge price tag too and the Bose is in another size class because of it size it can go anywhere. Rugged sturdy little bugger doesn't feel cheap at all quality gauge metal housing but light enough to carry all day.
customer_reviews.author: 17Soup76

customer_reviews.title: Meets the required purpose
customer_reviews.text: Should have volume control button or function. Overall, meets the requirements.
customer_reviews.author: purepashun

customer_reviews.title: Great solid sound!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased like six of these for gifts and have had mine for about three years. Wouldn't be caught without it! Great to travel with, too. Really good sound for the average music loving person. Also, my son in law is a professional musician and he uses it for his work. He recently purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: ChillKat

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great cheap little speaker. I bought it for the recharge feature that also plays music at the same time. Can get pretty loud if you max it and your phone volume out. As long as you're line of sight, I think I reached about 20 feet before it started to lose connection with my phone in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: well spent money and more satisfied than expected 20 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: Literally no complaints nothing but love...worth the money i spent...it looks way cooler in person i swear and sounds even better...this comes with a highly recommendation
customer_reviews.author: demonfoxnaruto3

customer_reviews.title: Just like the other couple no name speakers
customer_reviews.text: Just like the other couple no name speakers, they just don't work tp my satisfaction. They drop the bluetooth randomly
customer_reviews.author: royalwing

customer_reviews.title: Great for radio listening or podcasts while walking my dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure magic for the size. A bit of bass, but mostly it’s clear and accurate. Great for radio listening or podcasts while walking my dog and I don’t want headphones in.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Galina-Mehlman

customer_reviews.title: Stops working
customer_reviews.text: Second one in a row that stopped working after just a few months. I barely used it, it’s charged up but it won’t stay connected to my phone even though it’s literally next to it. It plays about 5-8 minutes then turns off. Pissed! >:-(
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this for music, so I don't have an opinion of its high-end sound quality. I think it's very functional, and the size makes it very easy to carry around, for example to the yard or even in the car. I also use it to amplify my laptop, which has no bluetooth through the use of the supplied cable, Beware that the reach appears somewhat limited and susceptible to obstacles. Don't think you can listen to it upstairs from a gadget on your floor below
customer_reviews.author: Koonstheman

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend loved the colors but I wasn't so impressed with the sound. It got loud enough and had some low end, but when charging other devices while playing music it gets awful. If that doesn't matter to you, then note that it feels solid, comes with a nice little bag, and has good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: GlennTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid
customer_reviews.text: After having this for an extended period of time, I'm super impressed by the seemingly indestructible nature of the device. I can toss it around anywhere. I expected the paint on the metal exterior to sustain damage, but it has actually collected very few scratches. The sound quality is fantastic for the size. The bass packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Liked the product
customer_reviews.text: I used my sons. He took to school, so I got one. Nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Denise P.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great looks great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great looks great, super durable I keep dropping it and the Bluetooth never skips a beat, gets really damn loud for its size!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bonnet

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 months and kept disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Speaker has now died and it's too late to return. I should have returned it when I first noticed it would error out and disconnect from the computer. I have two of the full-size or older style that I love, but this new model is no good.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: the sound is so much better than the phone/ipod speaker. Its not stereo system quality, but its so portable. its a great improvement with very little effort. the phone has to be w/in sight of the device tho. the other side of a wall or a person standing in the way can make the sound static-y or cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen McNamara

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker with large sound!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw it first thru my grandson, he bought one for his college dorm room. I liked that you could move it around with you, for even far distances with out any loss of signal. Perfect for when I am out doing work in the back or front of my house, or even just sitting around in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker
customer_reviews.text: i read a lot of reviews. there are many good speakers out there. these are good quality and i gave it as a gift. other options to look are Anker , Sharkk & Oontz XL, Edifier. these look to be good brands out of so many out there.
customer_reviews.author: chain03

customer_reviews.title: Mine sounds great but it's not very loud
customer_reviews.text: Mine sounds great but it's not very loud. It's perfect for listing to music while i work, not upset any of my bosses or coworkers. It is built tough so i am able to through it in my tool bag without worrying about any of my tools damaging it. plus it charges my phone if i need to. I am able to use it and go over a week without charging it. It is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good, but low max volume.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for a year.. I can give a better review. The sound quality is good, connection is good.. but the volume is very poor. It is essentially a one person speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Jstokes

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. I wouldn’t say it’s a Sonos, but it’s a great portable speaker. Well worth the sticker price.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Best portable mini speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is a wonderful portable speaker and I can say that from experience.
customer_reviews.author: COTK

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It is compact, the sound is good and a great value!
customer_reviews.author: kurt lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a deal of the day and used it while traveling in the hotel and poolside. It worked great in the hotel room but outside it just isn't loud enough to keep the party going.
customer_reviews.author: John Bader

customer_reviews.title: Very good Sound
customer_reviews.text: Bass may be a little weak, but this is a very good sounding unit! Nothing like having your favorite music playing while you work around the shop, yet keeping your phone on your person to receive calls. I would highly recommend this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: PJDSR

customer_reviews.title: Battery life sucks
customer_reviews.text: It connects well just like my other JLab products, but the battery only charges to 90% and then only lasts maybe 3 hours. It sounds good, but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Dare you to find another Bluetooth speaker with this price point, features, and build quality! Great sound that competes, if not surpasses, higher priced speakers such as Jawbone or Beats Pill. Not a lot of bass but clarity is great!
customer_reviews.author: PoussoNR

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: easy to connect, great battery life, sound is good but a little rough when it get high on the bass.
customer_reviews.author: C. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Wish bluetooth range was a lil further an louder
customer_reviews.text: I love it... I think it could be slightly louder an the bluetooth reception does not go as far as advertised. But im still happy with the product. That's why i give 4 not 5. I wish i woulda got the groupon rate at 39.99 but i missed out! I got it for 57.50 including shipping. Its loud for a dinner party or a bedroom. But its no waking up the neighbor loud l
customer_reviews.author: Juan Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Good look, but poor sound
customer_reviews.text: If the volume is higher than 50% the speaker sounds like it is blown.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound, small package!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound in a small package! Works great for my application.
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Sound
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back the Bluetooth kept disconnecting and it was not very loud I am impressed with their headphones but the speaker was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Doug Beall

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some kind of a speaker for my ipod to play while I worked. I chose this speaker from the reviews. I did not expect the great sounds it can make. I am very pleased with this and would buy it again for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: really solid little guy, not as loud as i ...
customer_reviews.text: really solid little guy , not as loud as i hoped . worth the $ if your not trying to fill s large room
customer_reviews.author: marleyspal

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker. Sounds good and the battery lasts for ever. Don't expect a "boom box" sound out of it but it will fill a garage or kitchen with good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Loudog33

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: +Small and sturdy. +Great sound quality. -Wish it was a little louder. -Advertised 10 hour battery life...closer to 7.
customer_reviews.author: JaFace86

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These little speakers sound great, very impressive for the size.Jlab had never disappointed me
customer_reviews.author: Steve Castonguay

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for college kids
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great for chilling with the boys at the hot tub or hammocking in the woods. I just toss it in my backpack so I always have a phone charger. Audio quality is great if you're not an audiophile. I hook up the audio out to our huge speakers and use the JLab as a bluetooth connector. Also, metal casing feels very durable.
customer_reviews.author: InstaGraham

customer_reviews.title: Crasher indeed
customer_reviews.text: Super long battery life. Very nice sound for such a small package.
customer_reviews.author: jdocop

customer_reviews.title: The loudest for its size.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few of these portable bluetooth speakers. This one is the most portable, easiest to pair up, and the loudest for its size. Also it holds a charge for a good long time.
customer_reviews.author: jazmaan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT sound quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my Crasher. We own 3 and one seems to go with us everywhere. VERY loud, great sound quality, easy features. Compare to jawbone and you'll go this route. Check out JLAB's web site for more quality products.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rowe

customer_reviews.title: So impressive I bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the size and super portable. I bought a second for a gift. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jeff calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: Connects easily sound it great from this little device. Sturdy build. If you're looking for a Bluetooth speaker, this one does it all while not being as expensive as many others.
customer_reviews.author: W. Epps

customer_reviews.title: Great sounds come from small packages!
customer_reviews.text: This tiny speaker produces the most fully deep resonant sounds you could possibly imagine. Easy to connect. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Rius 1

customer_reviews.title: Suberb style and build quality
customer_reviews.text: This puts out pretty decent sound for the size, not terribly loud but very clear. It may not be the best on the market in terms of sound quality, but the build quality is excellent. The aluminum enclosure is very durable and doesn't show fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: hunchan

customer_reviews.title: Love them both - they are great with great sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered two of these now. Love them both - they are great with great sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Gift for 13 year old
customer_reviews.text: Works great, Bluetooth is easy to set up and works well. Quality is incredible- I would say that this sounds even better than the pill. However, it is not nearly as loud.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Swear

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about it, the one thing I wish it had was a larger bluetooth range.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Good for most music.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the volume and clarity. But my caller felt that they could barely hear me over a land line, so this was somewhat disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lye

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little speaker, but not very loud. Doesn't go much further than the room you are in.
customer_reviews.author: jaime vance

product_meta.title: JLab Audio Crasher Mini, Metal Build Portable Splashproof Bluetooth Speaker with 10 Hour Battery - Blue
product_meta.description: Size:Mini| Color:BlueOur smallest footprint, Crasher Mini by JLab Audio provides amazing sound in a small, durable package. With a metal body and a splash-proof design, Crasher Mini keeps you rockin' through any adventure. Tough and sturdy, the Crasher Mini will play your music wirelessly from up to 30 feet away via Bluetooth® for 10 hours. Perfect for a study session, a pool barbecue or making dinner.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY SOUND : One highpowered drivers and one subwoofer synchronize to deliver vibrant highs and deep bass. Provides excellent stereo sound and enhanced bass from proprietary full-range drivers.

CRASH IN STYLE : Our sleek, simplistic design makes these speakers perfect for any setting, from formal occasions to fun nights out. Ultralight and super portable design is perfect for on-the-go music and easy to fit in your bag or backpack.
LONG BATTERY LIFE : With over 10 hours of battery life, a 1500mAh battery, and 30 feet range. You can keep the party going all day without having to recharge.

WIRELESS SOUND : Keep your audio tanglefree and hasslefree with Bluetooth 2.1 technology. Connects to all Bluetooth-enabled devices including iPhones, iPods, Smartphones, Macs, Tablets, and Laptops. Also compatible with all other audio devices with 3.5mm audio cable.

TWO YEAR WARRANTY/30 DAY GUARANTEE: We are so sure you’ll be happy with your purchase that we offer a “30-Day Money-Back Guarantee” to ensure customer satisfaction of our JLab products. Also included with our products is a 2-year limited warranty to ensure you are covered for up to two years in case any issues with our products arise.
